title: Wire up summary generation in fo-experience
description:
Update fo-experience.tsx to generate and pass the summary to completion screen.

Files to modify:
- app/fo-05/components/fo-experience.tsx

Changes:

1. Add completionSummary to OnboardingState (initially empty string)

2. Add isGeneratingSummary state for loading indication (optional)

3. Generate summary when transitioning to completion step:
   - When user finishes post-swipe screens and moves to step 12 (completion)
   - Call generateCompletionSummary with gatheringContext
   - Store result in state

4. Pass summary prop to StepCompletion component

5. Handle the async nature:
   - Generate summary when entering completion step
   - Can show completion screen immediately with loading state for summary
   - Or generate before showing (simpler approach)

Reference the GatheringContext that accumulates during the flow - it has all the exchanges needed.
acceptance_criteria: npm run build passes; summary is generated and displayed on completion screen when running the flow
